name: liCORE
description: Pulsara is focused on providing an advanced liquid staking solution on the Coreum blockchain, aimed at enhancing staking efficiency and flexibility. With its primary product, PulsaraLSD, the project allows users to stake their COREUM tokens and receive an equivalent amount of liCORE tokens. This process enables users to earn staking rewards while maintaining liquidity. The liCORE tokens can be used for various DeFi activities, such as trading or providing liquidity, without the need to unstake their COREUM, thus merging traditional staking with modern decentralized finance opportunities.
